intro.description:
Welcome to the XML Decryption Tutorial of the XML Security Tools.
This tutorial will show you step by step how to decrypt an encrypted XML document using the XML Decryption Wizard. You will open an encrypted XML document and then decrypt it. To start this decrypting session click the Click to Begin link below.
By the way, this tutorial shows only some possibilities of the XML Decryption Wizard. You can find more information in the extensive German online help.

item.title: Open an encrypted XML document
item.description: Open an encrypted XML document (you may have created with the XML Encryption Wizard). You can skip this item if your encrypted XML document is already opened in an editor.

item.title: Decrypt the document
item.description:
Now it is time to actually decrypt your XML document. Start the XML Decryption Wizard via the context menu by clicking on XML Security -> New Decryption....
On the first and only page you have to select KeyStore containing the used key (you may have created this KeyStore in the XML Encryption Wizard) and enter the used key. Both, KeyStore and key, may require a password which you have to enter as well. After that you can select an encryption ID in the Encryption ID drop down box.
Your XML document will be decrypted after clicking on Finish. If not you may have entered some incorrect information in the wizard. In this case launch the wizard again and enter the correct information.
